thread.title: DEBBIE TOLLESON

author: DEBBIE TOLLESON
title: DEBBIE TOLLESON
text:
Here's my thank you note, which explain more in detail..
Rob Smith Jr,
I wanted to express my gratitude to you for the wonderful job you did on making our wedding special for the both of us. Our guest were blown away by your work! You definitely have an eye for detail, you make each individual drawings come to life.
I can actually say that every one of our guest LOVED their caricature drawing..
Thank you Rob, your talent and creativity are truly a gift.
Tolleson Wedding
